byline.contributor: Jada F. Smith contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: Vows column on wedding of Joanna Wollersheim and Kevin McHale.
lead_paragraph: The couple, whose paths kept crossing, realized they could overcome stormy weather.

headline.main: A Lonely Walk in the Rain Leads to Love, Finally
headline.print_headline: Paths Cross (Again) on a Lonely Walk in the Rain

snippet: The couple, whose paths kept crossing, realized they could overcome stormy weather.
